name: Paint till you faint!
description:
A two player cooperative drawing racing game! Pen and paper recommended!

An Extreme Reality show, where artists race for money, fame, and power. We have crocodiles, bears, action and more!

A racing game combined with real-life drawing, where you can challenge your friends to a duel in wits, donkey-riding, and drawing realism art! To enjoy the game to it's fullest, we recommend playing the Drawing mode, with pen and paper.

Game has been created as a part of GDS Gamejam 2018.

Made by Team Rawhorse:

  • Jan Holan, the mastermind behind our Design, and a programmer who brought half of it to life.
  • Mikuláš Hrdlička, the lead coding wizard, and a backup artist.
  • Dasha Titova, who created the beautiful art and brought extreme realism into our game.
  • Jana Unzeitigová, who scavenged the internets for awesome sound effects, more art, written most of the dialog and texts, and refined the design to perfection.
